title: Enhancing Web Development Competencies: Evaluating the Effectiveness of Flipped Learning and Blended Learning: Social Statistics Response

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory statistics and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: The structural differences between flipped learning and blended learning models can be compared and explained.
A learning effectiveness evaluation tool using mixed research methods (survey + focus group) can be designed.
Learner engagement patterns can be visualized and interpreted through Likert scale analysis based on R.
Propose strategies to improve flipped classrooms to accommodate diverse learner groups
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
